Articles.Content: Hello all! I usually just lurk around. I've been trying to post a bug I've found in the support section but it doesn't seem to be letting me, nor is it letting me update my avatar. I'm a huge fan of the game and seem to be picking it up fast! Any help with my problems thus far would be greatly appreciated!

Blind helping the blind. I'm still at less than 5 posts, this will be my 3rd. After 5 posts, I will say that you should be able to add an avatar. I don't know what to tell you about posting a bug in the support section. Maybe that will work for you after your 5th post. To prove new members are not bots, you must post at least 5 times before more options are available to you. Read that somewhere on here, think in the forum rules.

Wow, this actually went through? I'm surprised. I skimmed through the rules and I didn't see anything about that. I may have missed it? It wasn't letting me post anything really. I was a little concerned. Thank you though!
